name: Kong of Wall Street - The Stock Brawler
name_original: Kong of Wall Street - The Stock Brawler
description:
Kong's monkey crew need to prove their worth and sell stock to earn the most dough!

Pickup and sell the stock announced by kong at the flashing terminals to earn cash.

Punch other salesmonkeys outside to oblivion to lower their worth.

MADE IN GODOT. 

Suck it Unity XD

A Game Jam Game by:

Robert Bünsow

John Victor Dahl

Controls:

P1:

WASD - Movement

Ctrl - Punch

Space - Jump

P2:

TFGH - Movement

Enter- Punch

Shift - Jump

P3:

IJKL - Movement

, - Punch

. - Jump

P4:

åöä' - Movement

Insert - Jump

Home - Punch
